q: why do they have to wash it
pred: The woman is washing the potatoes in the sink to remove any dirt or residue before cutting them up. This is a crucial step in the process of preparing potatoes for cooking, as it ensures that the potatoes are clean and free from any contaminants that could affect the taste or quality of the dish. Washing the potatoes also helps to remove any excess starch, which can make them cook more evenly and prevent them from becoming mushy.
